What it is: Identifies exhaustion caused by playing roles that no longer fit.
How to use it: Describe where you're feeling burnt out. Ask AI what symbolic roles you’re maintaining and whether they’re outdated.

What it is: Dissects complex trauma into symbolic, somatic, relational, and narrative components.
How to use it: Describe a traumatic pattern. Ask AI to separate its components and map how they interlock.
What it changes: Creates modular healing targets instead of one overwhelming mass.

What it is: Untangles your self-worth from achievements, relationships, or moral purity.
How to use it: Describe your sense of self. Ask AI what you’ve fused with that creates fragility or performance pressure.

What it is: Creates a ritualized vow to protect your core self from self-betrayal.
How to use it: Describe a moment of self-abandonment. Ask AI to write a self-loyalty vow based on the violation.

What it is: Tracks how your personal narrative morphs depending on audience, mood, or fear.
How to use it: Describe how you tell your story in different contexts. Ask AI to identify shifts and their motives.

What it is: Designs a symbolic end-ritual for unresolved events or lingering bonds.
How to use it: Describe an unresolved past connection. Ask AI to generate a ritual that represents closure.
What it changes: Completes emotional cycles and returns energy to the self.

What it is: Practices inner freedom through safe, symbolic defiance.
How to use it: Describe an internalized rule. Ask AI to help you design a safe act of symbolic defiance against it.
What it changes: Builds autonomy and tests internalized control.

What it is: Summons a stable internal observer to reflect on your state without judgment.
How to use it: Describe a chaotic internal moment. Ask AI to embody a calm observer and offer its view.

What it is: Exposes the deals you've made to gain love, safety, or validation by sacrificing authenticity.
How to use it: Describe a painful compromise. Ask AI what internal trade you accepted to survive.
What it changes: Restores lost parts by renegotiating old deals.

What it is: Constructs a full symbolic death/rebirth arc for identity transition.
How to use it: Describe a phase ending. Ask AI to simulate the symbolic death, liminal phase, and rebirth of the self.
What it changes: Transforms endings into rituals of emergence.
